alert.note: Alert for Alachua; Bradford; Clay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 09 at 8:45PM EDT until September 09 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Bradford County in northern Florida... Northeastern Alachua County in northern Florida... Southwestern Clay County in northeastern Florida... * Until 915 PM EDT. * At 845 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sampson, or 8 miles southwest of Starke, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Starke, Keystone Heights, Kingsley, New River, Sampson, Camp Blanding, Waldo, Lawtey, Hampton and Brooker. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
